name: PADO
description:
This is a mechanical prototype, visualization and sound test.

In this game you need to collect 3D shape, e.g animal like constellation by TAPing on the points and changing their state, and spending energy for linking this points. You can rotate and zoom in on the screen space.

I need some feedback if you have. And do you like this format( mechanic)? What did you like/dislike the most? Maybe, do you have any suggestions? 

Play and enjoy!
